title: Kite Strings of the Southern Cross: A Woman's Travel Odyssey (Travelers' Tales Footsteps
description: This feisty, sexy, energetic tale of a young woman's solo journey through Fiji, Bali, Malaysia, New Zealand, and Morocco offers the best of memoir and travel narrative combined. Gough chronicles her encounters with both humor and wisdom as she covers the globe on her own. "Passionate and poetic." - San Francisco Examiner
author: Laurie Gough
